description: Will not work and will not allow me to remove it

An image of a desert in which tiny tank icons pass from up to bottom & vice versa. You click on the said tanks, and they blow up. You have to wait every 6 shots, for a couple of seconds to reload. This is the entire game. The graphics are extremely bad, very low pixel art resolution,- eyestraining. Avoid this game under all circumstances. Folding socks is far more entertaining, I assure you.
In boom beach barrage looks juicy.
